summary:
• A previously unknown indigenous tribe was discovered in the Amazon rainforest.
• Loggers have been encroaching on their territory despite the presence of environmental laws protecting it.
• The Brazilian government has failed to take action to protect the tribe or their land.

• A Chilean firefighter has been arrested in connection with a devastating fire that claimed 137 lives.
• The blaze occurred at a shopping mall in Santiago, resulting in one of the country's deadliest fires in recent history.
• Authorities have launched an investigation into the cause of the fire, which remains unclear at this stage.

• The US has lost its popularity in China.
• Its influence is no longer as strong as it once was.
• This change may be attributed to various factors.

• The far-right movement is gaining popularity in European elections.
• It is abandoning support for the German party Alternative for Germany (AfD).
• This shift may lead to significant political changes in the region.

• Kenyan police will arrive in Haiti within three weeks.
• US missionaries were killed in Haiti due to gang violence.
• Three missionaries from an Oklahoma-based group were fatally shot in Haiti.

1. A fire in an Indian games arcade killed 24 people.
2. The incident occurred due to a possible short circuit or electrical issue.
3. The victims included both children and adults, with several injured still hospitalized.

• Ireland, Norway, and Spain recognize Palestine as a sovereign state.
• Three men appear in court regarding a €2.1 million cannabis seizure.

• Israeli activists clash over Gaza-bound aid convoys.
• Three more Israeli hostages found dead in Gaza; negotiations ongoing.
• Israel reinstates Associated Press' Gaza live feed after previous shutdown.

• Nicki Minaj's concert in Amsterdam was cancelled due to her arrest.
• The concert cancellation occurred after her detention by Dutch authorities.
• No further details about the reason for the arrest have been disclosed.

• A military junta seized power in Niger, led by Colonel Mamadou Bazoumoun Koyari.
• The new government faces significant challenges in maintaining stability, including addressing economic issues, regional tensions, and international reactions.

• Rescue efforts underway in Papua New Guinea following a deadly landslide that has trapped villagers.
• Emergency teams racing against time to reach isolated communities affected by the disaster.
• Multiple landslides reported in the region, causing widespread destruction and loss of life.

• Cynthia initially supported Nelson Mandela.
• She is now withdrawing her support from his successors.
• The reason for this change in stance is unknown.

• A murder case involving a politician and an astrologer led to changes in the law.
• Clive Myrie is disillusioned with the US due to mass shootings.
• Disney songwriter Richard M Sherman has died at age 95.

• A Russian airstrike hits a Kharkiv supermarket, killing two people.
• The attack occurs amid ongoing conflict between Russia and Ukraine.
• Details about other victims or damage are unknown.
